definition: lit. to lead beasts to eat the people (idiom); fig. tyrannical government oppresses the people

sentences.english: Ren injects As for the rate of animal food, will cannibalism , that the world perishes.
sentences.chinese: 仁义充塞而至于率兽食人，人将相食，谓之亡天下。

definition: ravenous wolves hold the road (idiom); wicked people in power/a vicious tyranny rules the land
enough blood flowing to float pestles (idiom); rivers of blood/blood bath
to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things
the rich man cannot be benevolent (idiom, from Mencius). It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven (Matthew 19:24).
tyrannical government is fiercer than a tiger (idiom)
lit. earthern pots make more noise than classical bells/good men are discarded in favor of bombastic ones (idiom)
pinyin: huang2 zhong1 hui3 qi4 wa3 fu3 lei2 ming2

definition: to replace one tyranny by another/to use violence against violence
